import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { SubjectService } from 'src/app/subject/service/subject.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-subject-list', templateUrl: './subject-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./subject-list.component.scss'] }) export class SubjectListComponent implements OnInit { subjectList:any[] = []; name:string = ''; id:any = 0; constructor(private SubjectService: SubjectService){ } ngOnInit() { this.SubjectService.getListSubject().subscribe(res => { this.subjectList = res; }) } handleCreate(name:string){ this.SubjectService.createSubject(name).subscribe(res => { this.subjectList = [...this.subjectList, res]; }) } handleFilter(id:number){ if(this.id === '' ) { this.SubjectService.getListSubject().subscribe(res => { this.subjectList = res; }) } this.SubjectService.getSubjectById(id).subscribe(res => { this.subjectList = [res]; }) } handleUpdate(name:string){ this.SubjectService.setNameEdit(name); } }
